articles.title: Microsoft-branded mice and keyboards are going away after 40 years - Ars Technica
articles.description: Higher-end Surface-branded accessories will carry on, at least for now.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ Microsoft's "green-eye" mouse, the first Microsoft-branded mouse the company sold.

If I asked you to name Microsoft's best-known and longest-lived product, you'd almost certainly … [+2722 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Google launches crackdown, takes down domains tied to CryptBot malware - HT Tech
articles.description: Google will take down current and future domains that are tied to the distribution of CryptBot malware, which is targeting users of Google Chrome.
articles.content: Even as awareness is raised about spread of cyber crime, hackers keep coming up with different ideas to steal data and money from people. Crackdowns have come frequently and Google has been an active… [+2564 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Scary solar storm today as terrible flanking CME to smash into Earth - HT Tech
articles.description: Forecasters have predicted that the Earth can be hit by a flanking CME cloud that was released by the Sun on Monday. It can spark a terrifying solar storm today, April 28.
articles.content: It has not even been a full week since one of the strongest G4-class geomagnetic storm struck the Earth and now, another similarly powerful storm is set to hit our planet today, April 28. According t… [+2387 chars]
